name: PHILIP MORRIS USA INC., petitioner, v. Mary BROWN, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Rayfield Brown.

casebody.head_matter:
PHILIP MORRIS USA INC., petitioner,
v.
Mary BROWN, as Personal Representative of the Estate of Rayfield Brown.
